lead_paragraph: Nothing gets the juices and the comments flowing better than a column on religion and the liberal state. But before attempting a response to the issues raised by readers of my previous column, I would like to offer a couple of clarifications.
snippet: A followup to last week's column on religion and the liberal state.

headline.main: Religion and the Liberal State Once Again

abstract: A followup to last week's column on religion and the liberal state.
